name: Proto 1
author: Vartio
notes: Poor Man's Sylvans (kinda), reached on 9th day of account. Reached L3 initially with Mai/Aroma Strategy, one less Lover (E-Con in its place) and Flowerknight Instead of Lotuswain (before demoting to L1). After getting 2nd Lover, above changes made, huge winstreak of 11 games, 1 loss (to 30-Card D-Hero) and another 5-win streak from there!
